title: Thalapathy61 Jyothika Bhanupriya Urvashi Magalir mattum teaser from 6 pm today - Tamil Movie News - IndiaGlitz.com
text: Happy Birthday Jyothika After a stunning comeback with '36 Vayathiniley' in 2015, actor Jyothika has completed shooting for another film titled as 'Magalir Mattum'. This film has been directed by Bramma who made his debut with the National Award winning film 'Kuttram Kadithal'. Now the makers have confirmed that the teaser of the film will be released today at 6PM. The announcement comes with the Motion Poster that features Jo and a peppy music score of Ghibran. 'Magalir Mattum' also stars Bhanupriya, Urvashi, Saranya, Nasser, Livingston, Luthfudeen Basha and many others. The film has been produced by Jyothik'a husband and leading hero Suriya under his 2D Entertainments banner.
